Are you on the hunt for exciting new challenges that boost your professional growth? If you’re a Java Developer by trade, we’d love to hear from you! Read on to see if you’d be a good fit for the Scopic team of 250+ professionals from over 40 countries.

At Scopic, the virtual world is our home so this is a full-time remote position. Only apply if you’re prepared for the zero-hour commute and the thought of collaborating with colleagues from around the globe excites you!



The skills and traits we’re looking for:

3+ years of hands-on experience with Java server-side development
Experience with the architectural patterns of large, high-scale web applications 
Understanding of the common design patterns and engineering practices
Experience of working with at least one modern build system
Solid knowledge of common algorithms and data structures
Strong knowledge of at least one major *NIX platform (Linux, OS/X, FreeBSD, etc.) 
Experience with some or all of these libraries and technologies is a plus: Jetty, Jersey, Jackson, JDBI, Hibernate, MongoDB, MySQL, Postgres, ActiveMQ, RabbitMQ, Kafka, ElasticSearch


What your day-to-day will look like: 

Design, develop, and architect services for the project
Contribute to cutting-edge R&D initiatives including service integration with emerging frameworks and platforms
Assist with technical resolution of issues on mission-critical production systems (you build it, you own it, you run it)


The secret ingredients that make us special:

Your growth is our growth. We invest in your future with paid training and other professional opportunities.
We’re industry innovators at the forefront of change. Equipped with the latest technologies and a team of knowledgeable colleagues by your side, you’ll embrace new and interesting challenges.
Your location. Your schedule — Pick your time-zone, choose your preferred hours, and work from the place where you feel most at home.
Flexibility and freedom are in our DNA! As long as you have a stable internet connection and the drive to thrive, you can travel and work from anywhere you like.
A workload you can rely on. We’ll set you enough tasks to keep that mind busy! At Scopic, we’ll ensure you always have a consistent flow of engaging, challenging work to do.
Recognition and reward. We acknowledge diligence and hard work through annual pay increases for good performance.


Down to business!

Salary Range: Your starting salary is negotiable depending on your skills and experience.
Both hourly and salary positions are available.
Employees are paid monthly via wire transfer.


Our values:

Scopic is an equal opportunity employer. We value diversity and do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, marital status, national origin, gender, veteran status, sexual orientation, age, or disability status.

Have the skills, the drive, and the passion to join the Scopic family?

Apply today to join our growing team of remote professionals from around the world.

Somos una aerolínea chilena de personas correctas, cercanas, valientes y comprometidas que comparten un propósito común: Poner el cielo al alcance de todos, entregando un servicio confiable y simple.

Te invitamos a ser parte del equipo de Despachadores Comerciales Part Time en el Aeropuerto de VALDIVIA, para ayudarnos a recibir con una sonrisa a nuestros pasajeros. Te tocará asistirlos durante el check in, el embarque y el desembarque, ¡por lo que la actitud positiva y la amabilidad es un requisito excluyente!.

¿Qué esperamos de ti?
- Que sepas leer a las personas, detectar sus necesidades y te importe darles un buen servicio.
- Que seas bueno/a escuchando y puedas comprender a nuestros pasajeros, para luego ayudarlos buscando soluciones oportunas a sus problemas. ¡Siempre lo agradecerán!
- Que estés de acuerdo con trabajar en sistema de turnos rotativos.

Mejor aún si…
- Has trabajado en turismo antes o en atención a personas.
- If you speak english is a plus!

Con qué te vas a encontrar…
- Una empresa multicultural que promueve la inclusión y ofrece igualdad de oportunidades a sus Skyers y futuros Skyers. Estamos comprometidos con la construcción de una sociedad más justa, equitativa y diversa.
- En SKY no somos fanáticos de las jerarquías, para hablar con tu jefe no va a ser necesario pedir hora, además estamos orgullosos de nuestro ambiente laboral y sobre todo queremos mantener la buena onda en nuestros equipos.
- Amamos lo simple y nuestra estructura lo refleja, por eso te ofrecemos posibilidades de desarrollarte a la SKY WAY, conociendo diferentes áreas de la compañía, trabajando en colaboración con diferentes equipos.
- En nuestro ADN está el gen de la innovación, no nos bastó con ser la primera Low Cost de Sudamérica y de Chile, queremos ir por más! Nos movemos rápido, pero cuidamos los detalles.

Y además...
- Tendrás la posibilidad de postular a becas para financiar hasta un 60% de tus estudios.
- SKY Fly: Pasajes ilimitados a todos nuestros destinos nacionales e internacionales pagando solo tasas de embarque y convenio con más de 20 aerolíneas, pagando tasas preferenciales.
- Descuentos en hoteles, servicios turísticos, arriendo de autos, gimnasios, etc.
- Beneficios de salud y financieros.

¿Y tú, te sumas a este vuelo?

#YoSoySkyer #MejorEquipo #CulturaSky

Te invitamos a ser parte del equipo de Despachadores Comerciales Part Time Concepción, para ayudarnos a recibir con una sonrisa a nuestros pasajeros. Te tocará asistirlos durante el check in, el embarque y el desembarque, ¡por lo que la actitud positiva y la amabilidad es un requisito excluyente!.

Somos una aerolínea chilena de personas correctas, cercanas, valientes y comprometidas que comparten un propósito común: Poner el cielo al alcance de todos, entregando un servicio confiable y simple.

¿Qué esperamos de ti?
- Que sepas leer a las personas, detectar sus necesidades y te importe darles un buen servicio.
- Que seas bueno/a escuchando y puedas comprender a nuestros pasajeros, para luego ayudarlos buscando soluciones oportunas a sus problemas. ¡Siempre lo agradecerán!
- Que estés de acuerdo con trabajar en sistema de turnos rotativos.

Mejor aún si…
- Has trabajado en turismo antes o en atención a personas.
- If you speak english is a plus!

Con qué te vas a encontrar…
- Una empresa multicultural que promueve la inclusión y ofrece igualdad de oportunidades a sus Skyers y futuros Skyers. Estamos comprometidos con la construcción de una sociedad más justa, equitativa y diversa.
- En SKY no somos fanáticos de las jerarquías, para hablar con tu jefe no va a ser necesario pedir hora, además estamos orgullosos de nuestro ambiente laboral y sobre todo queremos mantener la buena onda en nuestros equipos.
- Amamos lo simple y nuestra estructura lo refleja, por eso te ofrecemos posibilidades de desarrollarte a la SKY WAY, conociendo diferentes áreas de la compañía, trabajando en colaboración con diferentes equipos.
- En nuestro ADN está el gen de la innovación, no nos bastó con ser la primera Low Cost de Sudamérica y de Chile, queremos ir por más! Nos movemos rápido, pero cuidamos los detalles.

Y además...
- Tendrás la posibilidad de postular a becas para financiar hasta un 60% de tus estudios.
- SKY Fly: Pasajes ilimitados a todos nuestros destinos nacionales e internacionales pagando solo tasas de embarque y convenio con más de 20 aerolíneas, pagando tasas preferenciales.
- Descuentos en hoteles, servicios turísticos, arriendo de autos, gimnasios, etc.
- Beneficios de salud y financieros.

¿Y tú, te sumas a este vuelo?

#YoSoySkyer #MejorEquipo #CulturaSky

Description
Are you on the hunt for exciting new challenges that boost your professional growth? If you are a leader by nature and a Software Engineer by trade, we'd love to hear from you! Read on to see if you’d be a good fit for the Scopic team of 250+ professionals from over 40 countries. 

At Scopic, the virtual world is our home, so this is a  full-time remote position. Only apply if you’re prepared for a zero-hour commute and the thought of collaborating with colleagues from around the globe excites you! 

  

The skills and traits we’re looking for: 

7+ years of software development experience
2+ years of experience either as a senior engineer or technical lead
Extensive experience with full-stack, cross-platform development
Proficiency in at least one backend and one frontend language/framework
Advanced level of English fluency
Ability to understand and quickly get into new languages/technologies/frameworks
Great problem solving ability on both higher level and low level parts of software system
Desire and ability to lead, mentor, tutor and help team members
Bachelor's or Master's degree. 


What your day-to-day will look like:  

Helping in defining and shaping client's requirements
Designing solutions to meet the client requirements
Breaking down the solution into actionable items
Helping with creating timeline by estimating the items
Delegating tasks to team members (picking the right people for the right task and making sure the tasks are clear and understandable to the team members)
Enforcing and executing technical policies and best practices on projects such as code reviews, proper environment creation, source code management, etc
Helping team members to overcome technical problems
Helping with any problems or escalations on the projects
Helping with release management and deployments


The secret ingredients that make us special: 

Your growth is our growth. We invest in your future with paid training and other professional opportunities. 
We’re industry innovators at the forefront of change. Equipped with the latest technologies and a team of knowledgeable colleagues by your side, you’ll embrace new and interesting challenges. 
Your location. Your schedule — Pick your time-zone, choose your preferred hours, and work from the place where you feel most at home. 
Flexibility and freedom are in our DNA! As long as you have a stable internet connection and the drive to thrive, you can travel and work from anywhere you like. 
A workload you can rely on. We’ll set you enough tasks to keep that mind busy! At Scopic, we’ll ensure you always have a consistent flow of engaging, challenging work to do. 
Recognition and reward. We acknowledge diligence and hard work through annual pay increases for good performance. 
  

Down to business! 

Salary Range:  ~ $ 30 - 35/hour. Final offer is negotiable depending on your skills and experience.
Monthly salary option is also available.
Contractors are paid monthly via wire transfer. 
  

Our values: 

Scopic is an equal opportunity employer. We value diversity and do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, marital status, national origin, gender, veteran status, sexual orientation, age, or disability status. 

Have the skills, the drive, and the passion to join the Scopic family? 

Apply today to join our growing team of remote professionals from around the world.
